subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carl Pavano completed his spring training without adding to the list of injuries that had sidelined him for 21 months. If he stays healthy, he is expected to be the Yankees’ opening day starter.
snippet: Carl Pavano completed his spring training without adding to the list of injuries that had sidelined him for 21 months. If he stays healthy, he is expected to be the Yankees’ opening day starter.
